game.name: PINK ELEPHANT
game.shortDescription: An epic 2D shooter with pixel graphics, where you face off against a mysterious underground sect. Clear rooms of enemies, upgrade your weapons, and battle dangerous foes in thrilling and intense combat!
game.shortDescriptionEn: An epic 2D shooter with pixel graphics, where you face off against a mysterious underground sect. Clear rooms of enemies, upgrade your weapons, and battle dangerous foes in thrilling and intense combat!
